author: Susan Cosner
text:
“I have a client – a local development organization – that is interested in adopting a systematic approach to
providing financial incentives to business and industry prospects that are considering locating or expanding in this 
organization’s community, and specifically in a speculative business park.  The prospect must be willing to make its
own financial investment in the proposed development. The systematic approach that the development group develops 
may be designed to include a point system that ties performance by the developer/business to the amount of financial 
assistance offered by the local group.  
Could you share any development incentive models that exist at local jurisdictional levels similar to how I’ve
described the goal of my client?”
title: Development Incentives
